channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Hige pothole on mini roundabout by Swindon road and Tommy Taylors lane, 14th April
item.description:
Dangerous pothole on roundabout One of many in area.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Tommy Taylor's Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose paving stones, sinking and causing holes. Trip hazard., 14th April
item.description:
Lots of loose paving stones. Really uneven, lots of holes and stones sticking out. Causing water to pool

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Juniper Close, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple potholes, 14th April
item.description:
Multiple deep pot holes
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cheltenham

item.title: 6 potholes more than 75mm deep, 14th April
item.description:
6 potholes that need fixing which are all more than 75mm deep. Next door to school & pedestrian traffic lights

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 35 East End Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 5 large potholes over 75mm deep, 14th April
item.description:
Numerous potholes more than 75mm deep. Close to a school.

item.title: Two of three cycle stands damaged by motor vehicles, 14th April
item.description:
Significant damage to two of the three pavement mounted cycle stands, making them much harder to use and less secure.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Acton House, 13 Suffolk Square, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple pot holes at the traffic lights, 14th April
item.description:
Multiple pot holes at a number of the traffic lights in this spot where major roads join. Limited option for drivers to avoid driving through very large pot holes causing excessive car damage especially in bad weather. I imagine this disrupts the nearby residents with noise also
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Valiant Way, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes, 14th April
item.description:
More deep potholes that need addressing. Itâ€™s an accident waiting to happen.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 282a London Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep potholes, 14th April
item.description:
There have been very deep potholes all lined up down the edge of this road. This is extremely dangerous for cyclists and very damaging to cars. The fact that there are wires in the one closest to the traffic lights lead me to believe that the wires may be live. Shocking state of our roads. I would love to know where my money is going.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 London Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Massive vehicle damaging pothole, 14th April
item.description:
Caused damage to my front passenger tire. Just after left turn going towards Cirencester Road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 The Red Cottages Ermin Way, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Three potholes up this road, 14th April
item.description:
There are 3 potholes up this road - it's hard to mark them on the map but they are before Craig House (or similar, I don't know exactly what it's called).
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cliff House Leckhampton Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pot holes through newly repainted double yellows, 14th April

item.title: Flytipping, 13th April
item.description:
Pushchair in the undergrowth, adjacent to ramp between Honeybourne & St Pauls Road. On the left as you walk up.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Hardwick Campus Saint Paul's Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Pavement & road falling apart, 13th April
item.description:
The pavement and road are in an awful state and along with potholes are simply worn away. The pothole was mended briefly but whatever they did seems to have just made the situation worse. Please can this be fixed? It creates hazardous conditions for everyone who uses the road and pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 28 Church Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road in awful condition, 13th April
item.description:
Road is in a really bad state all the way down, particularly by the tennis club. Please can it be mended? Driving is becoming hazardous.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 176 Old Bath Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very deep pothole, 13th April
item.description:
This road is in poor condition all the way down but there's a particularly big pothole here.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Old Bath Road, Naunton Park
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 Road Works Signs at Location NOW for 6 Months!!!, 13th April
item.description:
At the lacation - just close to where Cleeve Common Road comes off the Burnt Oak Junction - 2 Road works signs have been ther for at least 6 Months and are NOT being used. This is the 3rd request to have them removed as vehicles have hit them and at the moment they are flat on the ground. Please can this request be carried out as they are also an eyesore.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 12ins round pothole, 13th April
item.description:
Out side number 22 Humber place brockworth. It's been there for months
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 21 Humber Place, Gloucester
